titles.title: Waiving a requirement of clause 6(a) of rule XIII with respect to consideration of certain resolutions reported from the Committee on Rules.

action.text: The House Committee on Rules reported an original measure, H. Rept. 107-294, by Mr. Reynolds.
Rule provides for consideration of the conference report to S. 1447.

calendar.text: Placed on the House Calendar, Calendar No. 98.

bill.summary: 11/16/2001--Introduced. Waives the requirement under rule XIII of the House of Representatives of a two-thirds vote to consider a Committee on Rules report on the same day it is presented to the House, with respect to any resolution reported on November 16, 2001, providing for consideration or disposition of a conference report on S. 1447 (aviation security) or any amendment reported in disagreement from a conference thereon.
